plan_name: Star Critical Illness Multipay Insurance Policy
sum_insured_options: Minimum Rs 5 Lakhs to Maximum Rs 25 Lakhs (In multiples of Rs 1 Lakh)
special_sum_insured_rules: Sum Insured for Earning Persons: 12 times of yearly income for 18 – 35 years age and 10 times of yearly income for above 35 years age. The maximum sum insured cannot exceed Rs 25 Lakhs. Sum Insured for Non Earning Persons: Maximum up to Rs 15 Lakhs. Non-earning sum insured cannot be more than the sum insured for the primary member.
wellness_program: Available. Insured can earn reward points and avail premium discount up to 10% on renewal premium.
best_suited_for: Individuals seeking a lump sum on diagnosis of critical illness
Individuals who want coverage for multiple critical illnesses

claim_details.max_lumpsum_per_group: Up to 100% of the Sum Insured
claim_details.claims_per_policy_year: Maximum One Claim only is payable in a Policy Year

pre_policy_medical_screening: Required for persons aged above 50 years and for those who declare adverse medical history.
